# lengthOfBytes(using:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the number of bytes required to store the `String` in a given encoding.

## Declaration

```swift
func lengthOfBytes(using encoding: String.Encoding) -> Int
```
title: lengthOfBytes(using:)
